data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Morales, Mírian Nunes, Massardo, Darli, Moreira, Gilson R. P., Thompson, Christian (2009): A new species of Alipumilio Shannon (Diptera, Syrphidae) found in association with the exudate resin of Schinus terebinthifolius Raddi (Anacardiaceae). Zootaxa 2112: 53-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187903
